home.subtitle: Great Northern Concrete Toboggan Race Team

about.mission: Innovation, sustainability, and teamwork in engineering design. Our team competes in the Great Northern Concrete Toboggan Race, showcasing York University’s engineering talent.

contactForm.description: Have questions about our team, events, or partnerships? Send us a message below!

sponsorForm.description: Interested in supporting York GNCTR? Fill out the form below and we’ll be in touch!
